title: Pick lobby puns
body:
Player 1: Hey, not feeling well so I may go afk this game
Player 1: Please bear with me
Player 2: Bear with you?
Player 1: Yeah, I may go afk so bear with me.
Player 2 locks in Volibear
Player 2: Yes, but bear with you?
Player 1: I'm serious.
Player 2: I'm a bear.

Game was disbanded because a player failed to select a champion.

Never seen someone rage quit in lobby over a harmless pun.
